body: @pradeepgangwar cool, thanks! I would do one PR at a time, one per model. When you make the PR, please write down both the results before adding the features and the results after adding the features.
@marco-c can i take this issue? I am contributing for the first time.
Sure. As described at https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug#contributing, any issue that is open and has no PR linked to it can be considered unassigned.
Hi @marco-c ,i,ve made some changes to use these features, how do i know if these features are being used now and i,ve done things correctly?
Train the model to which you have added the feature before and after adding the feature, and see if there's any change in the metrics.
Hey @marco-c ,  i checked the change in metrics for different models,and found significant change in only bug model.can i make PR?
Sure, but please attach here one text file per model showing your results before/after.

[bug_model.txt](https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug/files/2908732/bug_model.txt)
This is for bugmodel,like this for all?
[uplift_model.txt](https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug/files/2908775/uplift_model.txt)
For Uplift.

[qaneeded_model.txt](https://github.com/mozilla/bugbug/files/2910937/qaneeded_model.txt)
Here is the 'qaneeded' model, no changes at all. I think the rest of the models don't need to use these features and some are already using. So should i only implement this for 'bug' model? 
And Thank you @marco-c  :)

issue.title: use previously unused features(component and product)
